source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Diadem of the Highborne

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description: Your spells and abilities have a chance to summon 2 Army of the Dead ghouls for 15 sec.

passive_spell_tooltip.description: Reduces the cooldown of Apocalypse by 10.0%.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to strike your target for 115 Fire damage.

Unique:  Corruption Resistance increased by 10.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to cauterize your target for 498 Fire damage over 10 sec or to heal an ally for 498 over 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Your damaging spells and abilities grant you 2 Haste for 4 sec, stacking up to 10 times. This Haste is lost if you stop using spells or abilities against the initial target.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Unchained Gladiator's Plate Handguards

spells.description:
Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either Massive or Miniature for 30 sec.

Miniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 1,319 and Haste by 8,836.

Massive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 372,008, and Strength by 9,252.

Use: Channel to vent flames for 2 sec, dealing 3.1 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies.

Mechanical enemies become Superheated, taking 150,565  additional Fire damage when struck by your next harmful ability. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Reduce Sanity loss within the Visions of N'Zoth by 80%.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Strength by 506 for 15 sec. Requires the Heart of Azeroth. (Requires level 50 or below)
Use: Dispel any effects of N'Zoth's Corruption, and become immune to any further Corruption effects for 6 sec. (3 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Osteowings of the Necrolords

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of the Knights of the Ebon Blade.  All reputation gains while in Northrend dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.

reputation.display_string: Requires Knights of the Ebon Blade - Friendly
